title: DK Metcalf No Show, Clutch Players Draft, Packers without Davante Adams, and 49ers Focus
itunes:title: DK Metcalf No Show, Clutch Players Draft, Packers without Davante Adams, and 49ers Focus
description:
The Good Morning Football Podcast begins with DK Metcalf not showing up for Seahawks minicamp. Hosts Peter Schrager, Kyle Brandt, Will Selva, and Super Bowl Champion Shaun O'Hara debate how the team should handle this situation.  The table debates the most special player before deciding who is the best #2 WR in the NFL.  We draft our most clutch players in NFL history then move onto how clutch Aaron Rodgers will be for the Packers.  Closing out with the 49ers, Will thinks Deebo Samuel could be the biggest issue facing the team while Peter and Kyle are watching Trey Lance. 

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
